thread.title_full: Sonakshi Sinha to judge dance reality show 'Nach Baliye'? | Zee News

title: Sonakshi Sinha to judge dance reality show 'Nach Baliye'? | Zee News
text:
Sonakshi Sinha to judge dance reality show 'Nach Baliye'? By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Tuesday, February 21, 2017 - 13:30 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Shatrughan Sinha's darling daughter Sonakshi has made own standing in the Hindi film industry in such a short span of time. The diva, who made a smashing debut in Salman Khan starrer 'Dabangg' might soon be seen as one of the celebrity judges on popular dance reality show 'Nach Baliye' season 8. 
Yes! According to DNA, Sona baby might be seen as a judge on the show. The report quotes a source as saying, â€œShe has been informed that she will be required to shoot 26 episodes from March and will be balancing this with the promotions of Sunhil Sippy's Noor and the shoot of Abhay Chopra's Ittefaq." MUST READ 
Sonakshi has previously judged singin reality show 'Indian Idol' junior.
